Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Cudnall Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Understanding Car Park for Sidney Street Residents, 29th April
item.description:
Hi there, We’ve just moved into 8 Sidney Street and trying to get to the bottom as to weather a permit is needed or not for this car park. There is a space with the number 8 which we intend on using. Do you have any information who owns this car park? I’ve contacted MiPermit, Cheltenham Borough Council and Gloucestershire City Council and nobody knows! Looking forward to hearing from you, Kind regards, Callum Norledge
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidney Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
